title: acme_envelope_rejection
description: captures rejection  information along with rejected item

code.description: indicates why the item was rejected

issues.description: a list of problem(s) causing the subject item to be rejected

items.description: describes an individual issue/problem with the subject item

location.description: JSON path indicating where in the document the issue resides

reason.description: human readable description of the issue

context.description: primarily contains all of the properties found in the item's envelope but may include additional information

subject.description: the entity/item being rejected - envelope excluded
